567:1: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-guṇā ime bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca bhagavatā parikīrtitāḥ|
567:3: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-bahūni subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarmāṇyantarāyakarāṇyutpasyante|
567:5: bhagavānāha-teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānāṃ cireṇa pratibhānamutpatsyate|
567:25: na vayamatra gādhaṃ nāsvādaṃ labhāmahe ityutthāyāsanātprakramiṣyanti|
567:29: na no'tra grāmasya vā nagarasya vā nigamasya vā nāmadheyaṃ parigṛhītaṃ yatra no janma,
567:30: na no'tra nāma gotraṃ vā gṛhītam,
567:36: tairyāvadbhiścittotpādaistathā tathā tāvataḥ kalpān saṃsārasya punaḥ punaḥ parigrahīṣyanti,
567:38: tatkasmāt? imāṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāmaśṛṇvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā laukikalokottareṣu dharmeṣu na nirjāyante|
567:40: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñajñānasyāhārikāṃ vivarjya utsṛjya ye te sūtrāntā naiva sarvajñajñānasyāhārikāstān paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante|
567:42: yathā khalu punaḥ subhūte na laukikalokottareṣu śikṣitukāmā na laukikalokottareṣu dharmeṣu niryātukāmā iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣante|
567:44: evaṃ te parīttabuddhayo laukikalokottarāṇāṃ yathābhūtaparijñāyā mūlaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vivarjya utsṛjya praśākhāmadhyālambitavyāṃ maṃsyante|
567:45: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kukkuraḥ svāmino'ntikātpiṇḍāṃśchorayitvā karmakarasyāntikātkavalaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ manyeta,
567:48: ye imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñajñānasya mūlaṃ chorayitvā śākhāpatrapalālabhūte śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne sāraṃ vṛddhatvaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante|
567:51: na hi te'lpabuddhayo jñāsyanti-prajñāpāramitā āhārikā sarvajñajñānasyeti|
567:52: te prajñāpāramitāṃ vivarjya utsṛjya chorayitvā tato'nye sūtrāntā ye śrāvakabhūmimabhivadanti,
567:57: na hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yathā śrāvakayānikāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā vā pudgalāḥ śikṣante|
567:58: kathaṃ ca subhūte śrāvakayānikāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā vā pudgalāḥ śikṣante?
567:63: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyam|
567:64: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyam-ātmānaṃ ca tathatāyāṃ sthāpayiṣyāmi sarvalokānugrahāya,
567:69: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo hastinamapaśyan hastino varṇasaṃsthāne paryeṣeta|
567:70: so'ndhakāre hastinaṃ labdhvā yena prakāśaṃ tenopanidhyāyeta|
567:73: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ purūṣo bhavet?
567:75: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte tathārūpāste bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ,
567:76: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmajānānā aparipṛcchantastāṃ chorayitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmā ye te sūtrāntāḥ śrāvakabhūmimabhivadanti,
567:80: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ratnārthikaḥ puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ dṛṣṭvā nāvagāheta,
567:84: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte-api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo veditavyaḥ?
567:86: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte tathārūpāste bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ,
567:87: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvāpyanavagāhamānā avijānantastakṣyanti|
567:95: dṛṣṭa eva dharme anupādāya āsravebhyaścittaṃ vimocya parinirvāpayāmiti|
567:99: mahāyānasaṃprasthitā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhā bhavanti|
567:102: lokapariṇāyakā hi bhavanti te satpuruṣā lokārthakarāḥ|
567:104: ye ca khalu punaḥ subhūte aparipakvakuśalamūlāḥ parīttakubuddhikā mṛdukādhyāśayā bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ,
567:105: te ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān sūtrāntānajānānā anavabuddhyamānā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ chorayitvā ye te sūtrāntāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmimabhivandanti,
567:107: idamapi subhūte mārakarma veditavyaṃ teṣāṃ tathārūpāṇāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām tadyathāpi nāma subhūte palagaṇḍo vā palagaṇḍāntevāsī vā vaijayantasya prāsādasya pramāṇena prāsādaṃ kartukāmo nirmātukāmaḥ syāt|
567:111: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte vaijayantaprāsādapramāṇaṃ prāsādaṃ kartukāmena nirmātukāmena sūryācandramasorvimānātpramāṇaṃ grahītavyaṃ bhavati?
567:113: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani eke bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ,
567:114: ye prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā prajñāpāramitāmutsṛjya śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntaiḥ sarvajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
567:121: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te paṇḍitajātīyāḥ bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ?
567:124: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo rājānaṃ ca cakravartinaṃ bhraṣṭukāmo bhavet,
567:126: dṛṣṭvā ca īdṛśo rājā cakravartī varṇena saṃsthānena tejasā ṛddhyā ceti nimittaṃ gṛhītvā koṭṭarājaṃ paśyet|
567:127: sa tasya koṭṭarājasya varṇaṃ saṃsthānaṃ teja ṛddhiṃ ca nimittaṃ ca gṛhītvā apratibalo viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ prati evaṃ vadet-īdṛśa eva sa rājā cakravartī varṇena saṃsthānena tejasā ṛddhyā ca nimittena ceti|
567:128: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo veditavyo yaścakravartinaṃ koṭṭarājena samīkartavyaṃ manyeta?
567:130: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani eke bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ,
567:131: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā prajñāpāramitāmutsṛjya śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntaiḥ sarvajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ maṃsyante|
567:133: na khalu punarahaṃ subhūte ebhirevaṃrūpaiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntairbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ vadāmi|
567:134: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yattathāgatena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmupāyakauśalyamākhyātam,
567:135: tatrāśikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na niryāsyatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
567:138: tasmāttarhi subhūte tathāgata enāmanuśaṃsāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ paśyan anekaparyāyeṇa bodhisattvān mahāsattvānasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati saṃniveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati-evaṃ bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā bhaveyuranuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti|
567:139: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyāste bodhisattvāḥ pratibhānti,
567:140: ye avinivartanīyayānaṃ mahāyānamavāpya samāsādya punareva tadvivarjya vivartya hīnayānaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante?
567:142: bhagavānāha-tadyathāpi nāma subhūte bubhukṣitaḥ puruṣaḥ śatarasaṃ bhojanaṃ labdhvā hitavipākaṃ sukhavipākaṃ yāvadāyuḥparyantaṃ kṣutpipāsānivartakam,
567:144: ṣaṣṭikodanaṃ labdhvā śatarasaṃ bhojanamutsṛjya vivarjya taṃ ṣaṣṭikodanaṃ paribhoktavyaṃ manyeta|
567:145: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet?
567:148: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā prajñāpāramitāṃ riñciṣyanti,
567:151: prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā prajñāpāramitāmutsṛjya prajñāpāramitāṃ chorayitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkṛtya tataḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānapratisaṃyuktān sūtrāntān paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante|
567:154: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyāste bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ?
567:157: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo'nardhyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ labdhvā alpārdhyeṇa alpasāreṇa maṇiratnena sārdhaṃ samīkartavyaṃ manyeta|
567:158: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo veditavyaḥ?
567:160: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani eke bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ,
567:161: ya idaṃ gambhīraṃ prabhāsvaraṃ prajñāpāramitāratnaṃ labdhvā śrutvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānena samīkartavyaṃ maṃsyante,
567:162: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau ca sarvajñatāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante|
567:163: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyāste bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ?
567:165: bhagavānāha-idamapi subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam|
567:166: punaraparaṃ subhūte asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāsyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāmantaśo likhyamānāyāmapi bahūni pratibhānānyutpatsyante,
567:168: idamapi subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam||
567:169: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-śakyā punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitā likhitum?
567:171: ye kecitsubhūte prajñāpāramitāṃ lipyakṣarairlikhitvā prajñāpāramitā likhiteti maṃsyante,
567:175: punaraparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ deśamanasikārā utpatsyante,
567:197: śayanāsanamanasikārā jīvitamanasikārā itikartavyatāmanasikārā rāgamanasikārā dveṣamanasikārā mohamanasikārā ṛtumanasikārā sukālamanasikārā duṣkālamanasikārā gītamanasikārā vādyamanasikārā nṛtyamanasikārā kāvyanāṭaketihāsamanasikārāḥ śāstramanasikārā vyavahāramanasikārā hāsyamanasikārā lāsyamanasikārāḥ śokamanasikārā āyāsamanasikārā ātmamanasikārāḥ,
567:198: ityetāṃścānyāṃśca subhūte manasikārān māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃhariṣyati asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāmantaśo likhyamānāyāmantarāyaṃ kariṣyati,
567:202: punaraparaṃ subhūte utpatsyante rājamanasikārāḥ kumāramanasikārāhastimanasikārā aśvamanasikārā rathamanasikārā gulmadarśanamanasikārāḥ|
567:204: punaraparaṃ subhūte utpatsyante agnimanasikārā icchāmanasikārā dhanadhānyasamṛddhimanasikārāḥ|
567:205: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam||
567:206: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmutpatsyante lābhasatkāracīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāmantarāyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāmantaśo likhatāṃ lābhasatkāraślokasvādāścittotpīḍā vā|
567:210: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmimāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāmantaśo likhatāṃ ye te gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ sūtrāntā bhaviṣyanti śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktāḥ,
567:211: tān māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣaṇopasaṃkramya upasaṃhariṣyati-iha śikṣasva,
567:216: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena upāyakuśalena tebhyaḥ spṛhotpādayitavyā|
567:218: kiṃ cāpi subhūte teṣu sūtrānteṣu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni bhāṣitāni,
567:219: na khalu punarupāyakauśalyaṃ tatra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmākhyātam|
567:221: te imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitavyāṃ maṃsyante|
567:222: te imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyukteṣu sūtrānteṣu upāyakauśalyaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante|
567:223: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam||
567:225: dharmabhāṇakaśca kilāsī bhaviṣyati na dharmaṃ deśayitukāmaḥ|
567:226: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam|
567:227: punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaśca akilāsī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāṃ dātukāmaḥ,
567:228: dhārmaśravaṇikaśca kilāsī vā bahukṛtyo vā bhaviṣyati|
567:229: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam|
567:230: punaraparaṃ subhūte dhārmaśravaṇikaśchandiko bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāmudgrahītukāmo dhārayitukāmo vācayitukāmaḥ paryavāptukāmaḥ pravartayitukāmo'ntaśo likhitukāmo'pi bhaviṣyati,
567:232: dharmabhāṇakaścānyaddeśāntaraṃ kṣepsyate noddhaṭṭitajño vā na vā vipañcitajñaḥ,
567:234: iyamapi subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāmantaśaḥ likhyamānāyām|
567:235: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam|
567:236: punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaśca akilāsī bhaviṣyatyabhijño dātukāmo vācayitukāma imāṃ prajñāpāramitām,
567:237: dhārmaśravaṇikaśca deśāntaraṃ prasthito bhaviṣyati noddhaṭṭitajño vā na vā vipañcitajño'nabhijño vā bhaviṣyati|
567:238: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam|
567:239: punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaśca āmiṣaguruko lābhasatkāracīvaraguruko bhaviṣyati|
567:240: dhārmaśravaṇikāśca alpecchaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ pravivikto'rthaṃ vā na dātukāmo bhaviṣyati|
567:241: iyamapi subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ likhyamānāyām|
567:242: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam|
567:243: punaraparaṃ subhūte dhārmaśravaṇikaśca śrāddho bhaviṣyati imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrotukāmo'rthamavaboddhukāmo'rthaṃ dātukāmo'rthaṃ parityaktukāmaḥ|
567:244: dharmabhāṇakaśca aśrāddho bhaviṣyati alpeccho vā na vā bhāṣitukāmaḥ|
567:246: punaraparaṃ subhūte dhārmaśravaṇikaśca śrāddho bhaviṣyati śrotukāmo'rthamavaboddhukāmaḥ|
567:247: dharmabhāṇakasya ca tāni sūtrāṇi dharmāntarāyikatayā na saṃbhaviṣyanti nāvatariṣyanti|
567:249: iyamapi subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāmantaśo likhatām|
567:250: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam|
567:253: iyamapi subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāmudgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayitumantaśo likhitum|
567:254: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam|
567:257: sa tena middhagurukatvena samanvāgataḥ kāyaklamathena samanvāgato na śrotukāmo bhaviṣyati|
567:259: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam|
567:262: sa tena middhagurukatvena samanvāgataḥ kāyaklamathena samanvāgato na bhāṣitukāmo bhaviṣyati|
567:264: iyamapi subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati likhanāya vācanāya paryavāptaye vā|
567:265: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam||
567:266: punaraparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ kaścideva tatrāgatya nirayāṇāmavarṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
567:275: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam||
567:276: punaraparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ vā kaścideva tatrāgatya devānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate-evaṃsukhitā devāḥ,
567:281: tadapi ca sarvaṃ prajñatā vimṛśya sarvaiva duḥkhopapattiriti|
567:282: uktaṃ hīdaṃ bhagavatā-acchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakamapyahaṃ bhikṣavo bhavābhinirvṛttiṃ na varṇayāmi|
567:283: sarvaṃ hi saṃskṛtamanityaṃ sarvaṃ bhayāvagataṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvaṃ traidhātukaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ|
567:284: tadevaṃ sarvamaśāśvatamanityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharmakaṃ viditvā paṇḍitairihaiva srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptavyam,
567:287: mā no bhūyastābhiḥ saṃpattivipattibhirduḥkhabhūyiṣṭhābhiḥ samavadhānaṃ bhūditi|
567:289: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam||
567:290: punaraparaṃ subhūte ye'pi te bhikṣavo dharmabhāṇakāḥ,
567:297: evaṃ te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca arthikatayā chandikatayā dharmagauraveṇa taṃ dharmabhāṇakamanuvartsyanti,
567:302: yena yena durbhikṣaśca ayogakṣemaśca jīvitāntarāyaśca bhaviṣyati|
567:303: te ca dhārmaśravaṇikāḥ parebhyaḥ śroṣyanti-asau pradeśo durbhikṣaśca ayogakṣemaśca|
567:305: sa ca dharmabhāṇakastān kulaputrānevamabhivyāhariṣyati-amuṣmin kulaputrāḥ pradeśe durbhikṣabhayam|
567:306: kaccitkulaputrā yūyamāgamiṣyatha mā paścādvipratisāriṇo bhaviṣyatha durbhikṣabhayaṃ praviṣṭāḥ?
567:307: evaṃ te tena dharmabhāṇakena sūkṣmeṇopāyena pratikṣepsyate|
567:311: iyamapi subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyām|
567:312: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam||
567:313: punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇako yena jantubhayaṃ yena vyālabhayaṃ yenāmanuṣyabhayaṃ tena saṃprasthito bhaviṣyati|
567:314: sa tena caran viharan yena vyālakāntāraṃ sarīsṛpakāntāraṃ corakāntāraṃ pānīyakāntāraṃ durbhikṣakāntāraṃ tena prakramiṣyati|
567:315: sa tān dhārmaśravaṇikānevaṃ vakṣyati-yatkhalu kulaputrā jānīdhvaṃ yasmin pradeśe jantubhayaṃ vyālabhayaṃ kravyādabhayaṃ sarīsṛpakāntāraṃ corakāntāraṃ pānīyakāntāraṃ durbhikṣakāntāraṃ tena vayaṃ saṃprasthitāḥ|
567:321: ayamapi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāmantarāya utpatsyate uddiśyamānāyāḥ svādhyāyyamānāyāḥ yāvallikhyamānāyāḥ|
567:322: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam||
567:325: sa tayā abhīkṣṇāvalokanatayā bahukṛtyatayā tān dhārmaśravaṇikān pratyākhyāsyati-asti tāvanme kiṃcidavalokayitavyam,
567:327: iyamapi subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamāṇāyām|
567:328: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam||
567:329: iti hi subhūte māraḥ pāpīyāṃstaistaiḥ prakāraistathā tathā ceṣṭiṣyate,
567:342: tāni sarvāṇi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarmāṇīti boddhavyāni,
567:344: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-kimatra bhagavan kāraṇaṃ yadiha māraḥ pāpīyānevaṃ mahāntamudyogamāpatsyate?
567:346: yathemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na kaścidudgrahīṣyati na dhārayiṣyati na vācayiṣyati na paryavāpsyati na pravartayiṣyati na deśayiṣyati nopadekṣyati noddekṣyati na svādhyāsyati na lekhayiṣyati na likhiṣyati?
567:347: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi subhūte buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā|
567:350: prahīṇakleśānāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ na labhate|
567:352: ataḥ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamāṇāyāṃ mahatā saṃvegena mahāntamudyogamāpadyate|
567:354: yathā na kaścidimāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhedvā paryavāpnuyādveti||
567:355: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇāgatya bhedaṃ prakṣepsyati|
567:356: evaṃ ca navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ kulaputrā vivecayiṣyanti naiṣā prajñāpāramitā yāmāyuṣmantaḥ śṛṇvanti|
567:359: ityevaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān saṃśayaṃ prakṣepsyati|
567:360: evaṃ ca punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇāgatya bhedaṃ prakṣipya navayānasaṃprasthitān bodhisattvānalpabuddhikān mandabuddhikān parīttabuddhikānandhīkṛtānavyākṛtānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃśayaṃ pātayiṣyati|
567:361: te saṃśayaprāptā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgrahīṣyanti na dhārayiṣyanti na vācayiṣyanti na paryavāpsyanti na pravartayiṣyanti na deśayiṣyanti nopadekṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na lekhayiṣyanti na likhiṣyanti|
567:362: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam||
567:363: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣūnnirmāya buddhaveṣeṇāgatya evaṃ mārakarmopasaṃhariṣyati-yo bodhisattvo gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu carati,
567:367: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam||
567:368: evaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānevamādikāni subahūni anyānyapi mārakarmāṇyutpādayiṣyati asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamāṇāyām|
567:381: evameva bhagavan asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prāyeṇa bahavo'ntarāyā utpatsyante|
567:391: na dhārayitavyāṃ na vācayitavyāṃ na paryavāptavyāṃ na pravartayitavyāṃ na deśayitavyāṃ nopadeṣṭavyāṃ noddeṣṭavyāṃ na svādhyātavyāṃ na lekhayitavyāmantaśo na likhitavyāmapi maṃsyante||
567:399: na ca teṣāmudārodāreṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ prakramiṣyati,
567:401: na dhārayitavyāṃ na vācayitavyāṃ na paryavāptavyāṃ na pravartayitavyāṃ nopadeṣṭavyāṃ noddeṣṭavyāṃ na svādhyātavyāṃ na lekhayitavyāmantaśo na likhitavyāmapi maṃsyante||
567:404: atha ca subhūte ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahītavyāṃ maṃsyante dhārayitavyāṃ vācayitavyāṃ paryavāptavyāṃ pravartayitavyāmupadeṣṭavyāmuddeṣṭavyāṃ svādhyātavyāṃ lekhayitavyāmantaśo likhitavyāmapi maṃsyante,
567:406: buddhaparigraheṇodgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti lekhayiṣyantyantaśo likhiṣyantīti|
